content.raw: Jose, I'm not sure exactly what OpenSim does and I think @chrisdembia improved it recently. When OpenSim is distributed in binary it includes a local copy of Simbody's binaries and hence avoids installation problems. I'm not sure that would make any sense for Gazebo, but making anything robust on Windows can be very difficult. Chris may be able to provide more useful information.
